h2_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two
content: His combos will also become more aggressive and dangerous, and you'll see him jump up in the air and spin his staff multiple times. It will glow red as he smashes it down, and you'll need to dash out of the way to avoid it doing huge amounts of damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Great_Sage's_Broken_Shell.md', within the main section titled 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell', specifically from the subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
His combos will also become more aggressive and dangerous, and you'll see him jump up in the air and spin his staff multiple times. It will glow red as he smashes it down, and you'll need to dash out of the way to avoid it doing huge amounts of damage.
